item.title: The Kubernetes Handbook: A Comprehensive guide of 100 Q&A
item.description: Here are 100 questions that could potentially be asked on a Kubernetes exam or as part of a technical interview: What is Kubernetes? What are the main components of a Kubernetes cluster? What is a pod in Kubernetes? What is a node in Kubernetes? What is a cluster in Kubernetes? What is the Kubernetes API used for? What is kubectl used for? What is a Deployment in Kubernetes? What is Helm used for?
